Summary: Bright red light from N/Ne 15 Deg, turns due west. Saw 2 Years ago 2 times. same path. jet at approx 35.000. UFO at est, 80.000 - 120.000 FT.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Brookfield
There were no other sightings in Brookfield on or around July 4th 2013
divs: Sighting Details4th of July. 11 something PM. Everybody is looking skyword at fireworks. Jim says What is That! I turned and looked at a bright red light approaching from approx. 15 Degrees from the North East. I said It's a UFO! I saw the same red light 2 years earlier twice in one night. At the same time 2 years ago, a jet liner at about 32-35,000 ft. gave me a way to measure the approx. altitude! I estimated that because the aparent speed resembled a jet liner, this vehical had to be traveling Mach 5 at 100,000 Ft. I am so glad I had my camera with me. Now I try to keep it with me at all times, you never know? You might see BIGFOOT!!!
